about_the_game:
Stream from a cute cat café, where viewers can interact with the cats in the environment with redeems or bits.

Give your viewers more interaction on your streams, by converting those cheers or redeems into visuals in your background. Viewers get their names displayed against the kitties they command and are rewarded for their engagement by being a part of the stream, with their Twitch usernames displayed in screen against the chaos they cause.

This App is designed for 2D and 3D Vtubers who use VTubeStudio, VSeeFace, VNyan or Warudo (or any other app with spout2 capture). For other apps you can still use Cat Cafe as a background, although pulling your vtuber into Cat Café provides best results with some redeems appearing over your vtuber.

Since channel points and bits are used, you should also have at least affiliate status for your Twitch account to utilize the features.

Viewers get their names displayed against the kitties they command and are rewarded for their engagement by being a part of the stream, with their Twitch usernames displayed in screen against the chaos they cause.

This App is designed for 2D and 3D Vtubers who use VTubeStudio, VSeeFace, VNyan or Warudo (or any other app with spout2 capture). For other apps you can still use Cat Cafe as a background, although pulling your vtuber into Cat Café provides best results with some redeems appearing over your vtuber.

name: Stream Environments: Cat Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphics card with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphics card with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Stream Environments is a Twitch Integrated background for 2d & 3d VTubers, which lets your viewers interact with the environment around you with redeems and bits.
